title: #370: Arctic Circle (Season 2)
description:
Can’t get enough of Arctic Circle? Neither could we. We jump into Season 2 to see what Nina, Venla, and Marita, are up to now. Are Nina and Dr. Thomas still together? Has Esko stepped up to be a better father? What has Nina’s biological father — whom she’s been estranged from all her life — have to do with a cold case she is assigned to about a female Judo Champion’s murder? One thing we can say, there are even MORE mysterious men prowling around this season. And storylines, wow, do they ever get dark. So so dark. But Lisa’s favorite character Stenius is back, as dry and cryptic as ever! Join us. 

You can stream Arctic Circle Season 2 on https://www.topic.com. Or if you have Amazon Prime you can get it here https://amzn.to/3NPD1Vm

Want to go to Lapland and go snow surfing do yoga and stay in a cool lodge??? Hit up my friends at Lumi Active World. Reeta is the best! http://www.lumiactiveworld.com/1_8_locations.html

You too can also get a new smile in as little as 4-6 months – not years – and start seeing results in as little as 60 days. Laser-cut aligners match the contour of your teeth. Crystal-clear matte finish gives the aligners a more natural look. Head to www.smiledirectclub.com

 to get started for free.

Plus CUTS has all the essentials for looking sharp, like tees, hoodies, polos, and more. Join hundreds of thousands of guys who have made the simple decision to elevate their wardrobe with CUTS. ****************** SUPPORT OUR OTHER SHOWS ******************

CRIME ANALYST PODCAST - 

You’re interested in real crime? Tick 

You’re interested in good storytelling? Tick

You want content that’s respectful to the victims and honours them Tick

And you want more insight and in-depth analysis about “the who” “the what” “the where” “the when” “the how” and “the why”? Tick

And you want to know how you can prevent it? Tick

Congratulations! You’ve found your next podcast!

Ride shotgun with me, Laura Richards world renowned and award-winning Criminal Behavioural Analyst, former New Scotland Yard every week as we profile behaviour and identify the red flags to prevent murders in slow motion.

Come join me in the intelligence cell as we deconstruct and analyse real cases.

www.crime-analyst.com

KILLER CASTING PODCAST -Lisa, Dean, Hollywood master teacher Wendy Alane Wright and writer/producer David Fortune (Lisa just cast his Netflix film) weigh in on the Oscars....and the "you know what". They have some hot takes and we are here for them. www.killercastingpod.com 

BEST CASE WORST CASE

Be sure and check out Jim’s podcast Best Case/Worst Case that he does along with former Federal Prosecutor Francey Hakes. Join them as they go behind police lines with unparalleled access to law enforcement officers, looking back at their most memorable cases – for better or for worse. Subscribe now!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/best-case-worst-case/id1240002929
